summary:
This is an ENB preset for 0.319 of ENB Series.
This was made to enjoy weather changing and time elapsing in regular game play.
It is moderately bright and moderately dark, so you can play the game comfortably. (Maybe about the same as vanilla)
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is an ENB preset for 0.319 of ENB Series.[/size]
[size=3]This was made to enjoy weather changing and time elapsing in regular game play.[/size]
[size=3]It is moderately bright and moderately dark, so you can play the game comfortably. (Maybe about the same as vanilla)[/size]





[b][size=6]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/b]

[size=3][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB 0.319[/url]﻿

[url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENB Helper[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59809]Vivid Coulds and Fogs[/url][/size]





[size=6][b]RECOMMEND MOD[/b][/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8798][size=3]Faster Vanilla Horses

[/size][/url][size=3]﻿[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68496]Real Skyrim Snowflakes[/url] (If you need snowfall effect.)[/size]





[size=6][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/size]

[size=3]1. Download [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]ENB 0.319[/url], [url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]ENB Helper[/url] and this MOD.

2. Unzip "[color=#93c47d][b]enbseries_skyrim_v0319.zip[/b][/color]" and open "[color=#93c47d][b]WrapperVersion[/b][/color]" folder. Copy and paste 3 items shown below to Skyrim folder.
"[color=#93c47d][b]d3d9.dll[/b][/color]"
"[color=#93c47d][b]enbhost.exe[/b][/color]"
"[color=#93c47d][b]enblocal.ini[/b][/color]" (This file is unnecessary if you have already introduced ENB)

3. Unzip this MOD.
Choose Enable or Disable of Depth of Field.
Choose Quality or Performance. (This difference is only Enable/Disable of Ambient Occlusion)
Copy and paste 2 items shown below to Skyrim folder.
"[color=#93c47d][b]enbseries[/b][/color]" folder
"[color=#93c47d][b]enbseries.ini[/b][/color]"

4. Unzip "[b][color=#93c47d]enbhelper.zip[/color][/b]". Copy and paste "[color=#93c47d][b]enbhelper.dll[/b][/color]" into "[color=#93c47d][b]enbseries[/b][/color]" folder.

5. Open "[b][color=#93c47d]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/color][/b]" in "(Your Documents Folder)\My Games\Skyrim\" and edit shown below items.
[Display]
fGamma=1.0000
iMultiSample=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bTransparencyMultisampling=0
bDeferredShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1

6. Turn off any Anti-Aliasing in your graphics driver control panel.

7. Download [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59809]Vivid Coulds and Fogs[/url] and Install.

8. Finished.[/size]





[size=6][b]NOTE[/b][/size]

[size=3]I have not edited Blackreach yet.[/size]





[b][size=6]Q&A[/size][/b]

[size=3]Q. Outdoor night is too dark![/size]
[size=3]A. Open "[color=#93c47d][b]enbseries/enbeffect.fx.ini[/b][/color]" with text editor. Next, increase the number of "[color=#93c47d]Exterior: Night Brightness Multiplier=1.05[/color]".(eg 1.2 or 1.3 or 1.4 ...)[/size]

[size=3]Q. Dungeon is too dark![/size]
[size=3]A. Open "[b][color=#93c47d]enbseries/enbeffect.fx.ini[/color][/b]" with text editor. Next, increase the number of "[color=#93c47d]Interior: Brightness=0.9[/color]".(eg 1.0 or 1.1 or 1.2 ...) However, not only the dungeons but also all indoors will be brighter.[/size]





[size=6][b]CREDITS[/b][/size]

[size=3][url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]ENB Series
Boris Vorontsov[/url]

[url=http://www.dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]Skyrim ENBHelper
Alexander Blade[/url]﻿[/size]
author: kamonari

files.name: MOTOTARU ENB 1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed that sometimes fog does not be when foggy weather.

Added snow weaher.
Be compatible with Real Skyrim Snowflakes. (If you install this MOD, choose default snowflakes. I am don't test physical snowflakes.)

Added Sovngarde weather.

Added texture of raindrop.

Improved indoor ambient light. Became darker a little.

Improved ambient light in clear weather daytime. Became more blue shadow.

Improved all the weather overall.

files.name: MOTOTARU ENB 1.2
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed blue grass color when rain and storm. (It may occur with some WeatherID yet.)

Improved Reflection. The reflection noise of some armour and walls decreased.

Improved enbpalette.bmp. It becomes bright overall.

Increased outdoor Brightness.

Improved ambient light overall.

Improved clear weather. Better balance of light and dark.

files.name: MOTOTARU ENB 1.2.1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed too strong sunlight in clear weather of version 1.2.

Improved sky color. Became cyan to blue. (it is very very little difference.)

files.name: MOTOTARU ENB 1.3
files.changelogHtml:
Compatible "The Gray Cowl of Nocturnal".
Improved feel of skin. (Reduced Subsurface Scattering)
Improved clear and cloudy weather.
